SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT IFNULL(m.`Account`,m.`Name`) AS User_Name,f.`ID` AS `uuid`, f.`User_ID`,f.`User_Phone`,f.`QuestionDescribe`,f.`FeedbackStatus`,DATE_FORMAT(f.CreationDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CreationDate FROM `TB_MB_Feedback` f JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON f.`User_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE f.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND f.FeedbackStatus=@@FeedbackStatus@@ %> <%= AND f.QuestionDescribe LIKE @@search@@ OR m.`Account` LIKE @@search@@ %> ORDER BY f.ID DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>; SELECT count(0) AS total FROM `TB_MB_Feedback` f JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON f.`User_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE f.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND f.FeedbackStatus=@@FeedbackStatus@@ %> <%= AND f.QuestionDescribe LIKE @@search@@ OR m.`Account` LIKE @@search@@ %>;
